buginformation.summary: csv format excel should ignore empty header names
buginformation.description: have excel file with first row with column names there are additional columns that are not labeled excel exports empty columns for example this causes iae like java lang illegalargumentexception the header contains duplicate name org apache commons csv csvparser initializeheader csvparser java 368 org apache commons csv csvparser init csvparser java 248 org apache commons csv csvparser parse csvparser java 206 seems like the simplest solution ignore empty column names such that they cannot addressable and not attempt index them
